title: Repo names for integration testing not random enough
body:
The random names we're using (for repos, and so on) are not "random enough". Sometimes creation results in duplicate names which cause our builds to fail in an intermittent fashion.

For example, in `RtRepos.create()`, the repo name is created using `RandomNumeric(5)`. I think, at the minimum, we should use `RandomAlphanumeric(10)` for all names that have to be unique, whereever we can use them (not just in RtRepos). This will minimize the chances of our builds failing because of two concurrently executing tests generating the same name.

See from one of our recent [Rultor build logs](https://s3.amazonaws.com/relics.rultor.com/urn:facebook:1531296526/jcabi-github-on-pull-request/stdout/2014-04-28T13:45:00Z/log.txt):

```
[0;31mERRORm] pool-105-thread-1 com.jcabi.github.RtRepos: #create({\"name\":\"83570\"}): thrown java.lang.AssertionError(HTTP response status is not equal to 201:
422 Unprocessable Entity [https://api.github.com/user/repos]
Server: GitHub.com
Date: Mon, 28 Apr 2014 13:56:38 GMT
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4406
X-RateLimit-Reset: 1398693911
X-OAuth-Scopes: admin:org, admin:public_key, admin:repo_hook, delete_repo, gist, notifications, repo, user
X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes: public_repo, repo
X-GitHub-Media-Type: github.v3
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
X-Frame-Options: deny
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'
Content-Length: 215
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Expose-Headers: ETag, Link, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
X-GitHub-Request-Id: AE81AD3B:6E14:61EAE7:535E5E16
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff

{"message":"Validation Failed","documentation_url":"https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#create","errors":[{"resource":"Repository","code":"custom","field":"name","message":"name already exists on this account"}]}
Expected: HTTP response with status 201
     but: was <422 Unprocessable Entity [https://api.github.com/user/repos]
Server: GitHub.com
Date: Mon, 28 Apr 2014 13:56:38 GMT
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
X-RateLimit-Limit: 5000
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 4406
X-RateLimit-Reset: 1398693911
X-OAuth-Scopes: admin:org, admin:public_key, admin:repo_hook, delete_repo, gist, notifications, repo, user
X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes: public_repo, repo
```
